const MYFORM_CONFIG = {
    "id":"myForm",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "type": "Form",
    "configuration": {
       "title": "Sample Form generated by APAF",
       "class": "form-frame-noborder",
       "fields": [
         {
           "name": "fieldName",
           "label": "fieldLabel",
           "type": "select",
           "required": true,
           "size": 5,
           "datasource": {
             "type": "managed",
             "manager": "ruleDataManager",
             "payload": {"selector": {"name": {"$eq": "ruleDataName"}}},
             "adapter": "@.length>0?@[0].values:[]"
           },
           "renderer": {
             "label": {"type": "PrimitiveTypeItemRenderer"},
             "value": {"type": "PrimitiveTypeItemRenderer"}
           }
         }
       ]
    }
}
